Heyl Truck Lines Sponsored Hey there 👋 Caitlin & Hannah here with Heyl Truck Lines! We were hoping to catch you! We are looking for quality Class A drivers, just like yourself, to welcome to our team! Here’s a little glimpse of what we’re about. THE BEST COMPANY SUPPORT IN THE INDUSTRY: 👥24/7 Support Staff 📍Strategically placed terminals across the country to match our driver base and freight patterns COMPETITIVE PAY 🏆 Less than 2 years of experience: 54CPM 🏆🏆 2+ yrs of Experience = 56CPM 🥳🥳🥳 Monthly bonuses of 3CPM on TOP of the base pay ⬆️First raise after just 3-6 months! BENEFITS 🩺 Medical, dental, vision and life insurance 💎 401k w/ company match 💸1cpm mileage bonus 🦺 1cpm safety bonus 💪1cpm performance bonus 💰 $2,200-$2,500 referral bonus 🏝 PTO after 1 year 🐶 Pet Policy: Furry friends are welcome 🚛 2018 or newer Freightliner, Kenworth, or International Tractor ⚡️APU + 1,500 watt inverter Who wants in? Contact our Recruiters today! Click the link below or reach us at 800-973-9161 We hope to chat with you soon! HEYL.NET/DRIVERS Heyl Puts Drivers First.. Stop Wasting Time With Carriers Who Don’t!
